statement:
The *Leray spectral sequence* is a special case of the Grothendieck
spectral sequence regarding composition of functors.

If $f : X\to Y$ is a continuous map of topological spaces, and if
$\mathcal{F}$ is a sheaf of abelian groups on $X$, then there is a
spectral sequence, called the Leray spectral sequence, given by

$E_2^{pq} = H^p(Y,{\rm R}^q f_* \mathcal{F})\implies H^{p+q}(X,\mathcal{F})$

where $f_*$ is the direct image functor.
